cause.description:
We fund 39 important health & human service programs that vary from immediate needs to youth & senior services.
http://uwportage.org/
1. Our goal is to serve the local needs of Portage County
2. We meet local needs in health & human services
cause.mission: Mobilize resources to change lives, and make our community a better place to live.
cause.name: United Way of Portage County
